org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation

Class InnerClassAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.ClassAdapter
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation.InnerClassAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor, org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes

    public class InnerClassAdapter
extends org.objectweb.asm.ClassAdapter
implements org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
    Adapts a inner class in order to allow accessing outer class fields. A manipulated inner class has access to the managed field of the outer class.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team

    • Method Detail

      • visitMethod

        public org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor visitMethod(int access,
                                          String name,
                                          String desc,
                                          String signature,
                                          String[] exceptions)
        Visits a method. This methods create a code visitor manipulating outer class field accesses.
        Specified by:
        visitMethod in interface org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
        Overrides:
        visitMethod in class org.objectweb.asm.ClassAdapter
        Parameters:
        access - method visibility
        name - method name
        desc - method descriptor
        signature - method signature
        exceptions - list of exceptions thrown by the method
        Returns:
        a code adapter manipulating field accesses
        See Also:
        ClassAdapter.visitMethod(int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[])
